text: The Panama women's national football team plays football for Panama. The team is managed by the Panamanian Football Federation. Panama has played in the CONCACAF Women's Championship four times, and their best performance was reaching the semi-finals in 2018. In 2023, Panama took part in their first FIFA Women's World Cup in 2023 but didn't do very well, ending up at the bottom of Group F. == References == Category:North American women's national association football teams Category:Football in Panama Category:National sports teams of Panama
title: Panama women's national football team
